New Records: Nikola Jokic missed a game-tying 3-pointer at the buzzer
Key Match Events: Nuggets mounted a fourth-quarter comeback, wiped out a 16-point lead, established a 10-point advantage, then surrendered a 10-0 run to lose
Pre-Game Insights: Nuggets faced the Timberwolves, who had a new look with roster changes; Nuggets hoped for a third consecutive victory; both teams had changed since their Western Conference Semifinals matchup
Post-Match Reflections: Nuggets' bench play ranked third-worst in bench scoring; Michael Porter Jr. had a 29.6% shooting percentage from beyond the arc; Nuggets' struggles continued
Miscellaneous Highlights: Aaron Gordon led with 31 points and 11 rebounds; Anthony Edwards led the Timberwolves with 29 points; Nuggets' roster changes and Michael Porter Jr.'s performance were noted
